review:
I wanted a facility close to my residence and so shifted from national heart Institute to manipal hospital. 
I was asked to continue with the same medicines. 
He has asked me to get ECG, ECHO and TMT again since it has been a while since I got it done. I was asked to control my diabetes since that that was only at higher level.
Dr. BIPIN DUBEY is very efficient and polite.  We r very comfortable with him. I will recommend him to my friends .
I will update the review shortly. I will update the review shortly. I will update the review shortly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Extremely unhappy the way doctor speak and share feedback on the health condition of patient.  People spend money on big hospital to have friendly doctors who respond to family of patient.  Tone used on conversation is rude.  I will never recommend this doctor to anyone.
Good and timely advice and his hard work saved my life, after my bad condition even though I was not sure.

Highly recommend Dr Bipin Dubey.

Was under his in-house treatment for 2 days.  Found him an utterly knowledgeable and skillful Cardiologist.

I am back home without any major complications.

I wish him all success in life.
I am pretty happy with the services at the hospital. The doctor was very talented and cooperative. I am extremely satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,Hypertension,Irregular Heartbeat,
review: good suggestion , read all report few months and no many test and no write extra medicine  dr is good prescribed. heart and health issues

I have taken appointment and visited the hospital. ****** *** **** *** he had done my check up, after my check up treatment was given according to it and overall I am 90% satisfied. There was long wait time for me in hospital and I had to waited for almost 2 hours. In follow-up if there will fast response from the hospital it will be very useful and I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.
The prognosis was well explained. His treatment was excellent. I am highly satisfied with it. There was no waiting period at all. Everything was quick and smooth.
